title: DeskTop shortcut not updating
body: Currently when I open League the client asks to update the shortcut for the league, so I do the usual of running it as admin to make the changes. Yet no changes happen and the message keeps popping up when ever I log into League, could someone please tell me how get this shortcut updated so this stuff doesnâ€™t pop up

replies.body: You can always delete that shortcut and make a new one by right-clicking on the client in its installation directory if those shortcuts aren't getting updated.
